data.eml:eml: New Neotropical genera and species of Dryobiini and Rhopalophorini (Coleoptera: Cerambycidae: Cerambycinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Napp, Dilma Solange, Monné, Miguel A. (2009): New Neotropical genera and species of Dryobiini and Rhopalophorini (Coleoptera: Cerambycidae: Cerambycinae). Zootaxa 2137: 29-34, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.274993
